idea-plugin.name: Dubbo Invoke Generator
idea-plugin.description:
A modern IntelliJ IDEA plugin for generating Dubbo invoke commands from Java interface methods.
Features: • Smart command generation: Right-click on Java methods to generate Dubbo invoke commands • Keyboard shortcuts: Use Ctrl+Alt+D to quickly generate commands to clipboard • One-click copy: Quickly copy generated commands to clipboard • Intelligent parsing: Automatically parse method signatures, parameters and return types • Type support: Support for generating example values for various Java data types

action.description: Generate Dubbo invoke command for Java method
Quickly generate and copy Dubbo invoke command to clipboard
